roleset.name: having legal authority over
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. Has a FN sense, although that pertains particularly to the location sense, which is not eventive.

example.name: arg0
example.text: Since the time of the Syrian chaos to now , China has always supported the actions undertaken by the League of Arab States with an aim to limit and solve the problem within the jurisdiction of the League of Arab States ,
example.arg: of the League of Arab States
